page.title: 07Graffiti
page.content:
{Graffiti}is a very popular art form in this area. If you go into any subway you will see plenty of examples of graffiti.
Some of the most popular slogans are connected with Break Dancing, like:{Hip Hop Don't Stop! Many more are connected with pop groups.
You can sometimes find little verses written on bus stops. Some are amusing, some are just rude: { It was on the stroke of midnight { Her heart was all a quiver. { He undid her suspender belt, { And her leg fell in the river! or { God made things that creep and crawl, { And British Rail employed them all.
